doc:
Jerome Courtland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerome_Courtland 0 Jerome Courtland (December 27, 1926 – March 1, 2012) was an American actor, director and producer. He acted in films in the 1940s, 1950s and 1960s, and in television in the 1950s and 1960s. Courtland also appeared on Broadway in the musical Flahooley in the early 1950s. He directed and produced television series in the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s. He served in the Pacific Theater of World War II. Jerome_Courtland ( December_27_,_1926 – March_1_,_2012 ) was an_American_actor , director_and_producer . He acted in films in the_1940s_,_1950s_and_1960s , and in television in the_1950s_and_1960s . Courtland also appeared on Broadway in the_musical_Flahooley in the_early_1950s . He directed and produced television_series in the_1960s_,_1970s_and_1980s . He served in the_Pacific_Theater of World_War_II .
